meta.author: Ryan Luo

posts.title: Introduce myself
posts.text: New Citizen In East of ChinaWhen I was a young boy in high school, I image a world under my pen. When I was a adult struggling in this fascinating world, I image a world with my keyboard. I was born in a small village in Anhui province of China, and now I am continuing my career in East of China where people call Yangtze Delta, mostly in Shanghai, and at this moment– 01.19.2018, I take place as a data engineer in data department of a middle size company which is focused on spreading infomation in Med and Bio. I deal with half-structured data and text mainly,and write Python mainly. However, I have some experience in writing d3.js and vue.js and boostrap, also Use golang and Spark usually. My StudyI have earned a BS degree in Industrial Engineering, and I want to earn a Master degree in applied Math in Tsinghua University, It’s on the top of my list. I graduated with a middle level GPA, so I shall work hard to get in Tsinghua for a two year master project. I like reading historical research publications and do some research in History, mainly focus on 1760-1950s Northeast of china, where people called Manchuria. In engineering field, I am working on Network Science, Graph Theory, Natural Language Processing, and Knowledge Base. and till now I start reading frontier papers and applying them into production. I also do some reading in  Algebraic Geometry which is so brilliant, and am dabbled in Stochastic Process. My wish listI’ll meet 24 in lunar new year, and wanna to be a responsible man for job, for family and for my girlfriend. Now I’m learning Japanese and French, I wish I can speak them freely someday, maybe New Year at next year!

posts.title: my view on society
posts.text: I am a big fan of Friedrich Hayek, the most famous anti-totalitarian Austrian Economist and Thinker in 20th century .What I am focusing on is his master peice The Road to Serfdom

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
